bibl.title: Fragments of an Unknown Gospel and Other Early Christian Papyri.
bibl.note: P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586); 3 (= van Haelst 691); 4 (= van Haelst 75); 5 (= van Haelst 921).
bibl.seg: Bell H.I. and T.C. Skeat, Fragments of an Unknown Gospel and Other Early Christian Papyri.
London, British Museum, 1935, 8°, x-63 pp. et 5 pll.
P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586); 3 (= van Haelst 691); 4 (= van Haelst 75); 5 (= van Haelst 921).
